mapper.select: select qmnum, userid, qmtitle, qmcontent, to_char(qmdate,'MM-DD HH:MI') as qmdate, qmanswer, qmoption from qmboard where qmoption = 2 and userid = #{param1} order by qmnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into qmboard(qmnum, userid, qmtitle, qmContent, qmdate, qmanswer, qmoption) values(qmboardsq.nextval, #{userid}, #{qmtitle}, #{qmcontent}, sysdate, null, '2')
mapper.update: update qmboard set qmtitle=#{qmtitle}, qmcontent=#{qmcontent} where qmnum=#{qmnum}
mapper.select: select count(faqnum) totalRecord from qmboard where qmoption=2
